rooms.description: Open-plan living area adjoining the kitchen and central courtyard.
Integrated open-plan kitchen with living area
Guest or utility bedroom; includes attached bathroom for convenience

openings.description: Main entrance aligned with Vastu principles.
Large windows for natural light and ventilation.

courtyard.description: Central courtyard designed for natural light and airflow; landscaped with local flora following Vastu guidelines.

levels.additional_notes: Design incorporates industrial elements like exposed beams and robust materials to reflect a farmhouse aesthetic while ensuring functional zoning. The layout is tailored for a 50x80 feet plot maximizing spatial efficiency per Indian residential norms and Vastu principles.
